data.eml:eml: Two new species of the Pterostichusmacrogenys species group (Coleoptera, Carabidae) discovered in shallow subterranean habitats in northern Honshu, Japan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sasakawa, Koji, Ito, Hirotaro (2017): Two new species of the Pterostichusmacrogenys species group (Coleoptera, Carabidae) discovered in shallow subterranean habitats in northern Honshu, Japan. Subterranean Biology 21: 47-56, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/subtbiol.21.11155, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/subtbiol.21.11155
